summary: P74 Urgent/Acil İlan Yeni Pencere & Timeline Columns - All features verified. Bireysel/Kurumsal Acil İlan links open in new window with initialStatus=published. Timeline columns (Onay/Bitiş/Kalan) appear on urgent/featured/paid doping pages. API returns published_at, featured_until, urgent_until, paid_until fields correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: openInNewWindow: true correctly set for both individual and corporate urgent links in Layout.js (lines 470, 474)
initialStatus='published' correctly set for both urgent routes in BackofficePortalApp.jsx (lines 107, 120)
showDopingTimeline correctly toggles timeline column based on applicationsMode && doping type in AdminListings.js (line 124)
openApprovedUrgentInNewWindow() function correctly opens new window for urgent tab click when in applications mode (lines 301-311)
Backend correctly returns published_at, featured_until, urgent_until, paid_until in admin listings response (line 13461-13473)
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - tested with existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: P74 verified: All urgent/featured/paid doping pages have timeline columns (Onay/Bitiş/Kalan) showing published_at, end date, and remaining days. Urgent links in sidebar open in new window with target=_blank. The urgent routes have initialStatus=published so only approved urgent listings are shown.

bireysel_acil_tab_new_window.description: Clicking 'Acil İlan' tab on Bireysel İlan Başvuruları page opens new window to /admin/individual-listing-applications/urgent

kurumsal_acil_sidebar_new_window.description: Kurumsal Acil İlan link in sidebar has target=_blank and opens new window

bireysel_acil_sidebar_new_window.description: Bireysel Acil İlan link in sidebar has target=_blank and opens new window

urgent_page_initial_status_published.description: Both individual and corporate urgent routes have initialStatus='published' to show only approved urgent listings

timeline_column_header_urgent.description: Timeline header 'Onay / Bitiş / Kalan' visible on urgent pages

timeline_column_header_featured.description: Timeline header 'Onay / Bitiş / Kalan' visible on featured/vitrin pages

timeline_column_header_paid.description: Timeline header 'Onay / Bitiş / Kalan' visible on paid pages

api_returns_published_at.description: GET /api/admin/listings returns published_at field for timeline display

api_returns_doping_end_dates.description: GET /api/admin/listings returns featured_until, urgent_until, paid_until for timeline end date display

api_doping_counts_structure.description: API returns doping_counts with free, paid, showcase, urgent keys

Kurumsal Onaylı Acil İlanlar - Title matches, timeline header visible
